content: border worked in c with rs facing you join c into corner of work see * on photo below work 1dc into each row/foundation chain of the longest side of the shawl when you reach the corner don t turn chain 1 work 1 crab stitch into each double_crochet of the row below fasten_off when you reach the end tassels cut 3 lengths of each yarn at least 30 5cm/12 inches long sort yarn into 3 groups each containing 1 strand of each colour with work rs up insert hook into the edge of a corner of the shawl from beneath the shawl and out at the rs fold one tassel group in half and use your hook to pull some of the group through creating a loop pull the rest of the group through the loop just made and pull to tighten repeat for the other 2 corners trim the tassel groups finishing weave in all ends and block shawl to finished measurements * © 2019 hayley joanne robinson
